name: whiskepedia
description: **Authors**: Dave Trost (DaveTrost @ github), Donna Lambert (Sanvean74 @ github), John Nelson (john4850 @ github) **Version**: 2.0.0 (increment the patch/fix version number if you make more commits past your first submission)

scripts.test: cd public && npm i esm jsdom && npx qunit test/index.js
scripts.recreate-tables: npm run drop-tables && npm run create-tables
scripts.setup-db: npm run recreate-tables && npm run load-seed-data
